Posts.Content: my dearest friend was told by doctors in the er at Floyd Medical center, Rome Ga. that she may have imflamitory breast cancer. I would be so happy to her from someone that has had it and what their systems were. The Docs are going to do a biopsi on her sometime this week. From what we have read on the internet is that this a fatle fast growing type of breast cancer. Please, anyone who can tell us about this killer would help us very much. you may e-mail me at --Message edited by CancerCompass staff. For personal protection, email address removed. Consider private reply. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html-- ." target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html-- . My friend is only 29 yrs old. and I want to give her all the support I can find. Please help us understand this and hearing from a surviver or a unlucky lady who is batteling it now would really help us understand this desease much better.                                                                                                                                                                                                           Thank you so very                                                                                                                                                                                               --Message edited by CancerCompass staff.
